dict.string: Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can send a message, dictate a note, or even find a restaurant.
Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can make a phone call, send a message, dictate a note, or even find a restaurant.
Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can send a message, dictate a note, or even find a restaurant.
Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can send a message, dictate a note, or check the weather.
Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can make a phone call, send a message, dictate a note, or check the weather.
Siri helps you get things done just by asking. You can send a message, dictate a note, or check the weather.
Siri sends information like your voice input, contacts, and location to Apple to process your requests.

Siri lets you use your voice to interact with and use many features of your iPad.
Siri understands what you’re saying and also what you mean, so you can speak naturally when you ask it to help you do something. It also knows enough about you — your location, contacts, and contact relationships — to provide intelligent, personal assistance.
You can ask Siri to:

Siri lets you use your voice to interact with and use many features of your iPhone.
Siri understands what you’re saying and also what you mean, so you can speak naturally when you ask it to help you do something. It also knows enough about you — your location, contacts, and contact relationships — to provide intelligent, personal assistance.
You can ask Siri to:

Siri lets you use your voice to interact with and use many features of your iPod touch.
Siri understands what you’re saying and also what you mean, so you can speak naturally when you ask it to help you do something. It also knows enough about you — your location, contacts, and contact relationships — to provide intelligent, personal assistance.
You can ask Siri to:
Find a local business with directions
Send and respond to messages and email
